sys_ui_message.message: 1. Go to the [Workday](https://wd3.myworkday.com/absa/d/home.htmld) and search Change Benefits. 2. Select **13th Cheque% Election Change (ZA)** as the **Change reason**. Enter the **Benefit Event Dat**e**(1st if the following month)** and click **Submit** 3. Up next click **Open**. 4. Under Change Benefit Elections. Click **Let's Get Started** 5. Click **Enroll**. 6. **Select** the 13th cheque tax deduction frequency **(e.g Monthly or Annually).** 7. Enter a **Percentage** that you will contribute to this plan in the contribution (%) text block. Click **Save**. 8. Click **Review and Sign**. Review your Benefit Elections and ensure that all elections are correct prior to submitting 9. Click **Submit then Done.**
